title: Quick Green Chicken Chili
directions: 1. Heat oil in Dutch oven over medium heat until shimmering. Add onion, pepper, and salt and cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in garlic and cumin and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute. Stir in broth, beans, and salsa, bring to simmer, and cook until flavors meld, about 10 minutes.
2. Using back of wooden spoon, mash some beans against side of pot until chili is slightly thickened. Stir in chicken and cilantro and cook until heated through, about 2 minutes. Serve.
